security_constraints.name: End-to-End Encryption Constraint
security_constraints.constraint_statement: The system shall implement end-to-end encryption for all data in transit.
security_constraints.rationale: To ensure confidentiality and integrity of data as it travels across networks.

mission_impact_if_violated.capability_degradation: Potential unauthorized access to sensitive data, leading to breaches and loss of customer trust.

security_constraints.name: Immediate Alerting Constraint
security_constraints.constraint_statement: The system shall issue transaction alerts to customers in real-time.
security_constraints.rationale: To enable customers to quickly detect and respond to unauthorized transactions.

mission_impact_if_violated.capability_degradation: Delay in fraud detection, resulting in financial losses and decreased customer confidence.

security_constraints.name: Multi-Factor Authentication Constraint
security_constraints.constraint_statement: The system shall require multi-factor authentication for access to sensitive functions.
security_constraints.rationale: To enhance the security of access to accounts and sensitive operations.
security_constraints.enforcement_mechanism: Technical controls requiring multiple forms of authentication

mission_impact_if_violated.capability_degradation: Increased risk of unauthorized access and fraudulent transactions.

security_constraints.name: Software Maintenance Constraint
security_constraints.constraint_statement: The system shall be maintained with up-to-date software, including security patches.
security_constraints.rationale: To protect against vulnerabilities in outdated or unpatched software components.
security_constraints.enforcement_mechanism: Regular software updates and patch management processes

mission_impact_if_violated.capability_degradation: Vulnerability to exploits and malware, leading to data breaches and compromised systems.

security_constraints.name: Load Management Constraint
security_constraints.constraint_statement: The system shall implement measures to prevent overloading of core banking services.
security_constraints.rationale: To ensure availability and reliability of banking services under high demand.

mission_impact_if_violated.capability_degradation: Reduced system availability, leading to inability of customers to access services during peak times.
